DOC.brief_summary: Bystander CPR improve survival Out Hospital Cardiac Arrest . This study examine efficacy ultra-brief video train Hands-Only CPR . Subjects randomize one four training condition , assess CPR skill retention .
DOC.brief_title: Ultra-Brief Versus Brief Hands Only CPR Video Training With Without Psychomotor Skill Practice
DOC.detailed_description: Bystander CPR improve survival Out Hospital Cardiac Arrest . This study first kind examine efficacy ultra-brief video train Hands-Only CPR without use manikin . The result inform future effort mass train citizen CPR . Subjects randomize one four training condition , assess CPR skill retention . The four group 1 ) training ; 2 ) ultra-brief training video ( 90 second ) ; 3 ) short training video ( 5 minute ) practice ; 4 ) short train video hands-on practice . The subject evaluate CPR skill retention . One half subject evaluate training day , half evaluate two month later .
DOC.criteria: Members local area church Less 18 year old formal CPR training certification within last 2 year Lacks fluency English Works health care provider
DOC.keyword: Education general public regard resuscitation method
